price: Bagkus kay Allāh ay sumamba ka at maging kabilang ka sa mga tagapagpasalamat.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
